titleStmt.title: The court of the gentiles. Part IV. Of reformed philosophie wherein Plato's moral and metaphysic or prime philosophie is reduced to an useful forme and method / by Theophilus Gale.
titleStmt.author: Gale, Theophilus, 1628-1678.
